movies.title: Weightwatch
movies.originalTitle: La suerte de la fea... a la bonita no le importa
movies.plot: Known in English at Festivals as "Weightwatch," this title captures the essence of the film. Susie is obsessed about losing weight, thus being "bonita" and not "gorda" - the two keywords in the original Spanish title. She calls on a fairy godmother to grants her three wishes. Susie resorts to these to become the most beautiful woman in the world.
movies.simplePlot: Known in English at Festivals as "Weightwatch," this title captures the essence of the film. Susie is obsessed about losing weight, thus being "bonita" and not "gorda" - the two keywords in...

biography.bio: Alejandra Gollas was born in 1976 in Mexico City, Distrito Federal, Mexico. She is known for her work on Efectos secundarios (2006), The Librarian: Quest for the Spear (2004) and Weightwatch (2002).
biography.name: Alejandra Gollas

biography.bio: Alma Wilheleme is an actress, known for Weightwatch (2002), El sueño de Elias (2003) and Redención (2010).
biography.name: Alma Wilheleme

biography.bio: Evelyn Gonzalez is an actress, known for Weightwatch (2002), Hazard Lights (2014) and Can't Move On (2014).
biography.name: Evelyn Gonzalez

biography.bio: Dulce Guerrero is an actress, known for Weightwatch (2002) and ¡Ah qué Kiko! (1988).
biography.name: Dulce Guerrero
